value:
If there are people in need, I will do
my utmost to help as many as I can,
be they my own citizenry or not.

The people should lead the way into
the future, not kings. A king's task is
but to build the path before them.

Bringing so many together, despite
their differing customs and beliefs,
is no easy task. You should rest.

Do you ride? We could go out,
if it suits you. Nothing brightens
a mood quite like fresh air.

I am not above working the fields.
To use the strength my father gave
me only for battle would be a waste.

I do not wish to intrude, but I bring
regards from $Nf.
I will tolerate not one more death!
This will serve me well in the future.
Any progress is significant.
I will not waste this.

I am Dimitri, King of the Holy
Kingdom of Faerghus. You called,
and I answer willingly.$k$pLet this lance clear the way forward!

Forgive the clumsiness of my words,
but meeting you here has been a true
blessing for me.$k$pI am what I've become because
I have fought many battles—and
taken many lives.$k$pI have dealt that justice not only
as king, but as an avenger.$k$pI have not shied away from cruelty
in the past, and I have made many
to suffer as a result.$k$pI am unlikely to find honor in this life.
And yet you keep me at your side...$k$pI know only one other person like
you. A person who offered me their
unfailing support...$k$pEven if we are to part one day, I will
not forget you—nor will I forget your
guidance. I am grateful for every bit.
おおっ！
終わりだ！
ぐっ…！
面白い…！
On my honor!
We will not lose!
Don't let them retreat.
It's our chance to prevail.
This is my punishment...
Yes?
Here, I can almost forget the burden of my title.
Moderate your mischief-making, will you?
Our bloodlines and ideals may differ, but we can still help one another.
Life, once lost, never returns... We must never forget that.
No one moves forward all on their own. You must learn to rely on others.
The past cannot be changed... Sins can never be washed away...
I would love to show you what Faerghus looks like covered in snow.
Yes.
Your orders.
I'll comply.
